plot: An alien invasion occurs, but people are worried more about their own lives to pay attention. Meanwhile, Nozomu believes his student Jun can read his mind and takes measures to stop him.
title: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Robo no eshi/Hazukashii hon Bakari Yondekimashita/Usume no Natsu
plot_es: An alien invasion occurs, but people are worried more about their own lives to pay attention. Meanwhile, Nozomu believes his student Jun can read his mind and takes measures to stop him.
original_name: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Robo no eshi/Hazukashii hon Bakari Yondekimashita/Usume no Natsu
plot_en: An alien invasion occurs, but people are worried more about their own lives to pay attention. Meanwhile, Nozomu believes his student Jun can read his mind and takes measures to stop him.
